snippet: DOERFLER--Marvin, passed away suddenly but peacefully at home in The Landings, Savannah, Georgia, on June 4, 2016. Beloved husband, adored father, entrepreneur extraordinaire, and bemused curmudgeon, Marvin was a man who made his life a constant creative enterprise. With great wit he excelled at seeing the humor in the world's absurdities, never failing to point out when the emperor's clothes were a sham. Marvin showed by example how to live a life of empathy, love, and humor in the face of life's challenges. He is survived by his loving wife Myrna and his three sons Steven, Brian and his husband Jim, and Eric and his life partner Sherry. There will be a celebration of his life at The Plantation Club at The Landings on June 18 from 2-4pm. 1/3
